name: Don't Touch The Floor!
description:
THE FLOOR IS LAVA!

Jump from boxes to boxes as you avoid landing on lava.
____________________________________________

• Endless gameplay
• 20+ Characters
• Simple arcade game for all ages
____________________________________________

Simple one-tap control makes game easy to play.

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
